entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
